General.Name: Al Hassan Ghazi Ibrahim Shaker
General.Description: Al Hassan Ghazi Ibrahim Shaker Company, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the trading, wholesale, and maintenance of spare parts, electronic equipment, household equipment, and air-conditioners in Saudi Arabia, Jordan, and the United Arab Emirates. The company operates through three segments: Heating, Ventilation and Air-Conditioning (HVAC) Solutions; Home Appliances; and All Other. The HVAC Solutions segment offers residential and commercial air conditioners, including chillers and related services. The Home Appliances segment provides televisions, washing machines, dryers, refrigerators, irons, gas cookers, and floor care. The All Other segment offers consultancy services for energy solutions; and sells mobile phones. The company also provides agency services to LG air conditioners, as well as other home appliances brands, including Indesit, Ariston, Maytag, and Bompani, Midea. In addition, it engages in importing, exporting, and maintenance service of electrical and home appliances; and offers marketing services. The company offers its products through a network of sales outlets, service centers, warehousing facilities, and training academies, as well as a network of distributors, such as specialty retailers. Al Hassan Ghazi Ibrahim Shaker Company was founded in 1950 and is based in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia.
General.Address: Shaker Group Building, Riyadh, Saudi Arabia, 11422
